text: Kɨ fomɨra uan gumazamiziba mong men atara, egha Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibav mɨkemezɨ, me iza mɨzazim me gase. Me izava amɨraghavɨra me gasɨghasɨghizir puvatɨ. Me, me gasɨghasɨghamin mɨtaghniam gafiragha bar me gasɨghasɨki. Ezɨ kantrin igharaziba datɨrɨghɨn osɨmtɨziba puvatɨgha deraghavɨra iti. Ezɨ kɨ osɨmtɨzir ekiam men iti.
